desc: Portable Bathtub for adults, Japanese soaking tub made for shower stalls. We provide innovative ofuro bath tubs for bath lovers. Modern aesthetics, better design and versatile draining means the best portable bathtub ever. Perfect for small bathrooms, ice bath for athletes and outdoor camping. Small and Large available
